channel.description: This chapter describes the following major topics: [ {.c37}]{.c36}Overview of shell scripts [ {.c37}]{.c36}Write scripts to display basic system information, employ shell and environment variables, use command substitution, and manipulate special and positional parameters [ {.c37}]{.c36}Execute and debug scripts [ {.c37}]{.c36}Know exit codes and test conditions [ {.c37}]{.c36}Understand logical constructs: if-then-fi, if-then-else-fi, and if-then-elif-fi [ {.c37}]{.c36}Write scripts using logical statements [ {.c37}]{.c36}Know arithmetic test conditions [ {.c37}]{.c36}Comprehend looping construct: for-do-done
